name: Shin_Dan
description:
• Imagery of a storefront in Detroit (source: Pexels / Chris Smith)
  • Green circles with varying transparency to illustrate a center for which the abstract shapes are gravitating towards - could also be viewed as the Earth
  • Abstract shapes of varying colors to illustrate the different groups of people, at once, being separate - think 2020-2021 and the pandemic, but also looking for a reconnection of sorts - could also be viewed as countries coming together for Config 2021!
